name: Add LionDesk contacts from Formstack forms after validating emails with ZeroBounce
description: Every time a new form is submitted on Formstack, Make will automatically validate the email with ZeroBounce. If the email status is "valid" it will look the person up with Clearbit and if there is a result it will create a contact on LionDesk. If the status of the email is "invalid" it will send a Slack message.
